website_summaries.verdict: These risers can help you raise your bed up to 8 inches.
pros: Capable of holding up to 1,200 pounds
Can be utilized as 3-inch, 5-inch or 8-inch bed risers
Designed to minimize the risk of floor damage
Stackable, ensuring you should have no trouble storing the risers as needed
cons: Less sturdy than many similar bed risers
May crack or fall apart, even after minimal use

customer_reviews.title: Bed Risers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to go under a twin size adjustable bed. Was a little leary that they would not be strong enough.They work just fine. Have had them for seven months and not a problem. Using them has given some much needed storage space in a small bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: portco

customer_reviews.title: Staircase needed for Yorkie
customer_reviews.text: Stairway to heaven now, sleeping on clouds. It makes tons of room underneath the king bed as well. Awesome product. Used all of them and it seems sturdy. Had to get a staircase for the Yorkie though.
customer_reviews.author: Cat K.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are quite sturdy bed risers that hold a lot of weight. I stacked my queen size mattress and box spring on their full height, and they hold it well. I can now store boxes under my bed. Only reason I'm giving 4 stars is that the set only includes 4 risers. Since my bed frame had a 5th center spike, I had to switch bed frames with my housemate. The set should really come with 5 risers--or you should have the option to pay a little more and get a 5th riser (instead of having to buy 2 sets).
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: We love the malouf bed raisers
customer_reviews.text: Malouf raised me and my husband bed high. We love the malouf bed raisers, couldn't do without them. Was what I expected...
customer_reviews.author: aundy

customer_reviews.title: My bed broke through the top part of these risers ...
customer_reviews.text: My bed broke through the top part of these risers within a week, and is no where near the weight limit.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Del Morone

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These worked well and were so easy to use. I wanted to give some height to my bed and these worked like a charm. I just placed the block under each foot of my bed frame and they snapped right in. I didn't even realize the product came with two sets of height blocks. I'm super excited to use other the other set when we add a bed to our second bedroom in a few months. They're not particularly visually appealing, but a long bed-skirt fixes that easily. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these because they were supposed to be sturdy. Two broke within the first week
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because they were supposed to be sturdy. Two broke within the first week. I am so disappointed. NOT heavy duty as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Strong, sturdy, & the perfect height!
customer_reviews.text: The product is very sturdy & the multiple heights were perfect for what I needed. This product was a great find! Would highly recommend it If your bed or other furniture needs a lift.
customer_reviews.author: Carollyn Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great to raise my bed up enough to provide lots of storage underneath.
customer_reviews.author: A. Haney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bed riser kit
customer_reviews.text: I needed some extra storage in my bed room. These risers are extremely strong and support my bed and anything else I can load on it. the three sizes make it the perfect kit to pick the perfect size for how much to lift your bed . I did not try but I bet it would work on a couch as long as it had normal legs. I would recommend this to anyone who ned to raise a bed to gain more storage.
customer_reviews.author: sulley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly as described and they worked for raising the bed. Shipping was very prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Keeney-Storm

customer_reviews.title: wow what a difference!
customer_reviews.text: I used this item raise up my futon and it makes all the difference in my world. And the bonus is that the space under is perfect my size storage boxes. This pleased me greatly!
customer_reviews.author: May Olson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Well-Made!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing bed risers! I've owned several sets of other bed risers over the years and these are by far the best. They are so sturdy and fit together very snugly. I have them currently on the highest setting and it's the perfect height to be able to store stuff under the bed. The bed actually is on wheels :| and these risers still work!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Tall is TALL
customer_reviews.text: I like these as it gives me usable space under the old bed frame. The taller option is pretty tall though. I had to add a stool for my 5 year old grandson to get in the bed. If you use the lower option, I think just about anybody but a toddler or very elderly person could easily get in the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Sugaard

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery and rescue help appreciated
customer_reviews.text: Weight capacity for my hospital bed and me. Removing from Open Heart Surgery and complications. These have made it possible to have my bed at proper height. Relieving strain on chest, back and knees. Affordable and quick delivery made it extra special too. Bless Your Company💜
customer_reviews.author: MF Brown

customer_reviews.title: I can't say whether that is true but my husband and I are both over weight and these are holding up fine. The only negative I ca
customer_reviews.text: The description for these state up to 2000 lb capacity. I can't say whether that is true but my husband and I are both over weight and these are holding up fine. The only negative I can think to mention is that, the insert that came inside the box, show a picture indicating that the wheels of a hollywood bed frame may be left on and fit into the well on top. My experience with leaving the wheels on was, when the bed was bumped, the wheels would roll to one side or the other causing the risers to flip over. After I removed the wheels the problem resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Damm

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: My new bed's frame was too low for under bed storage. I ordered this because of the multiple heights feature. I'm only needed the 5 inch which works great. Plan to use the 3 inch platforms under another bed.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Craig Brown

customer_reviews.title: Pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Five stars at this writing. The Risers seem to be quite sturdy and durable. I forgot I had two support legs between the headboard and footboard. I took the four 3 inch risers, stacked two together, and placed them under the center supports. This did not cause the bed to be off balance.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great extra height.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great to add extra space for storage. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Anvil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These made a great deal of difference in my boys room
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: as described
customer_reviews.text: worked great on my daughters dorm bed. Lifted enough that we could store bins under her bed
customer_reviews.author: Mish

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great to raise our bed to the desired height.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Henn

customer_reviews.title: I have the original size bed risers but these made my bed even higher n I love it. I highly recommend them to anyone who ...
customer_reviews.text: They met my expectation 100% , I have the original size bed risers but these made my bed even higher n I love it. I highly recommend them to anyone who like a high bed, in the future I will buy some more if I need to.
customer_reviews.author: jeanette shine

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered ... literally.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to raise my Mom's couch & love seat & they worked great. We only used the bottom portion as it brought her furniture to the perfect height & are very stable.
customer_reviews.author: ccs93Top Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Risers
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mother, she did not in the end use them but kept in case.
customer_reviews.author: Leilani

customer_reviews.title: Looking for bed risers?k  Give these a try.
customer_reviews.text: Much better than expected. They are very sturdy and fit the castors on the bed frame (which is the same brand) I expected something like what i purchased from a big box store, which were worthless and had to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Almagirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly and is exactly what I wanted. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Joan L. Knisely

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty. One broke. Says it holds ...
customer_reviews.text: Not heavy duty. One broke. Says it holds up to 1200 lbs. It didn't. Also, the heights given of 3, 5 and 8 inches is not precise. The lowest setting is closer to 4".
customer_reviews.author: parentsof4

customer_reviews.title: they crack fast
customer_reviews.text: they cracked after two months..... the box says they hold up to 1200 pounds and get they cracked already. Was very disappointed and can’t even get my money back or just return them even though the box ALSO states a 5 year warranty????
customer_reviews.author: emma

customer_reviews.title: Only had blocks for a week and working great, if they last my daughter's 4 yr college ...
customer_reviews.text: Only had blocks for a week and working great ,if they last my daughter's 4 yr college stay i will give them 10 stars lol but dont see a problem and good quality product thanks
customer_reviews.author: edward s boggs

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had these for a few months now and they are great. Good quality and it gives you a lot of extra storage under the bed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These things are great. Just when I was running out of space ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are great. Just when I was running out of space and risked some cluttered areas, I got much needed space with these risers.
customer_reviews.author: Roderick

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. The 5 inch set was just what I ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. The 5 inch set was just what I needed to lift my quilt cutting table to the right height. No more bending over and ending up with a back ache. Going to order a second set.
customer_reviews.author: Karon Hobart

customer_reviews.title: Makes e xtra storage under bed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect when extra storage is needed for an extra person moving in
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: create storage space
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. I now am able to put some much needed storage boxes under my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy H

customer_reviews.title: Super easy
customer_reviews.text: Needs these to raise a small table and they work perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Made a big difference.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 2 sets (8) for our queen bed. They're sturdy and do the trick, but we sometimes stub toes on the mid-side ones. Otherwise they'd get 5 stars. They raised the bed to a more comfortable height with no wobbling, and that's what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn A. Straub

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic purchase! Highly recommend these bed risers
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic purchase! Highly recommend these bed risers. Solid and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: J. Power

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect height to create some much needed under bed storage!
customer_reviews.author: Karla Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did what they were meant to do. Much sturdier than I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. I used the 3" and 5" together to raise a tv table 8" for my mother. She is very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: amparo n. ramsey

customer_reviews.title: built like a tank
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, would definately buy again. Couldnt imagine these ever breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to have the option of going high or going low.
customer_reviews.author: P. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: These worked great. They fit a metal bed frame with wheels
customer_reviews.text: These worked great. They fit a metal bed frame with wheels. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Used these for one month and they broke underneath the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We ended up only needing the shortest height but it was nice to have the option
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for. We ended up only needing the shortest height but it was nice to have the option. We have a heavy platform bed and have had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Risers met my needs
customer_reviews.text: Nothing elaborate but does the job. Sturdy and allows different heights.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Barcellona

customer_reviews.title: OK BED RISERS - NOTHING SPECIAL
customer_reviews.text: Seem to do what they were designed to do - raise the bed.
customer_reviews.author: A Craig Stimmel

customer_reviews.title: Great in theory
customer_reviews.text: The actual risers themselves were okay, they do make the bed rather mobile on hardwood so just be aware of that. Additionally, moving the bed up does make it less stable, but that's not a problem with the risers, just FYI to anyone thinking about purchasing. My problem is that despite having 6 points of support, both of my middle pegs punched right through the larger supports. I am lucky this didn't break my bed. I'm not sure where the manufacturer get off deciding these would support 1,200lbs, but it was likely a cherry picked number assuming the bed frame was a flat rigid surface spread across all 4 supports on a twin size bed.
customer_reviews.author: E.Mac

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and gives u two sizes to choose from
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Sue Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I use them for the bed in my dorm. The only small issue I have, is that if for some reason I need to pull my bed out from the wall, the whole bed falls off the risers. I guess thats *technically* a feature of the risers, but it can be super frustrating to have to pick my bed back up every time I try to make my bed. Also-Installing these takes two people: one to lift the bed, the other to put two risers underneath that end of the bed!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use these in my sewing room under my cutting ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my sewing room under my cutting table legs and it saves my back so much when cutting fabric or pinning a quilt.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Warning: I didn't listen, no I'm paying...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last 50 day's (busted right through middle of one leg).... read the other bad reviews and didn't heed the warning. to reference the weight on my bed, Full size bed/boxspring - GF and I(100lb &190lb) - so 300-350lbs and we only used the lower section. Stacked together the mattress was about 3-4ft off the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: ... - my son broke thru 2 of the risers pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.text: These were supposed to be heavy duty - my son broke thru 2 of the risers pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad Advertising
customer_reviews.text: These will more than meet our requirements, but are far from what they are advertised. Specifications as received they are 1200 pounds capacity and 28 cubic feet of added space. As advertised they are 2000 pounds capacity and add 32 cubic feet of storage space. Fortunately my wife, cat, dog and I don't come close to the 1200 lbs. Were these being used to raise a shelving unit, instead of a bed, this could present a major problem.
customer_reviews.author: rgd

customer_reviews.title: Unclear product details
customer_reviews.text: These were advertised as a "set of 8 adjustable bed risers" (even the box says that) which would have been great for our six-legged bed ... but unfortunately this is a set of four adjustable bed risers that consists of 8 pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Routzstein

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome bed risers
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome bed risers. The recessed part that the bed frame legs go on/in are deep, which definitely helps keep the bed secure. I was afraid that my bed would be more unstable being raised 8 inches, but it's not. I am easily able to fit the large Sterlite modular drawers under my bed now, which was the main reason for raising my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and very Stable
customer_reviews.text: Theses are super sturdy and I felt safe using them under the kid's beds without worry that they would topple. I will be purchasing another set to keep on hand because it was difficult finding a set in my area that was this sturdy and stable. Love the product.
customer_reviews.author: English Gardner

customer_reviews.title: sturdy for multi-uses
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the sturdiness of these risers. We actually plan to use these to raise 4x8 banquet tables that we use for painting woodwork, doors, crafting, etc. It really makes it so much easier on the lower back.
customer_reviews.author: professor

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, made to last.  Two heights with additional stackers.
customer_reviews.text: These are heavier duty than your normal risers, there are two pieces so you can go two different heights. Be advised that the base footprint is rather large and sticks out slightly from under the bed. This may be a problem for clutsy people like me, but so far I haven't tripped. Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: D. Alt

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This seemed to have solved the messy teenagers room. Now she can store laundry baskets under her bed full of the garbage and junk teenagers think is important.if you plan on lifting the bed 8 in off the ground plan on buying a stool as well. To get in the bed you're definitely going to need help up.
customer_reviews.author: michael hart

customer_reviews.title: Needs reinforcement
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'0 and 195lbs. My wife is 5'7 140lbs. About 2 weeks after putting these under the corners of our queen size bed, I walked into the bedroom and saw my wife laying on the bed, which was at an incredibly awkward angle, because the top blew out and the leg went straight through the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Adam P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for adding storage space under a bed or futon
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for adding storage space under a bed or futon. I have used these for a few months with my ikea futon and they have worked great. Can accommodate the round base of the futon frame just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Fella

customer_reviews.title: They do the job just fine!
customer_reviews.text: Using the risers is working just fine. I raised our couch 5" and it really helped. The only thing is, that I had to order a second set of risers because our couch has 8 legs where I thought there were only 4.
customer_reviews.author: J Boydston

customer_reviews.title: stable & secure, just what the Dr. ordered
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought this first. When I first ordered a non-adjustable set of bed risers, I didn't take into consideration that my queen bed has a leg supporting the middle of the bed. I tried a brick, but it didn't support the bed as it should. With this product, it supports all the legs so I can sleep at an incline, relieving my reflux issue, getting a good nights sleep.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brice

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy but lightweight, used for elevating a bed. Used an automobile jack to raise the bed one side at a time, and insert the bed risers underneath. Worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Chesapeake38819

customer_reviews.title: I like it because now I can see above the foot ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it because now I can see above the foot of my iron bed to watch TV and not look through the metal iron bed rail. I am not sure yet if the height is more healthy for me.
customer_reviews.author: SEAY

customer_reviews.title: Great value & durable
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value and very well made. I use 2 of these for the head of my bed to help my Gerd condition.
customer_reviews.author: Maryam Crosnoe

customer_reviews.title: Margaret
customer_reviews.text: Make furniture higher and easy for elderly to get on up and down on the furniture. I used them for more than bed raisers. I places them under my sofa, love seat and chair.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Did the job.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a Tuft and. Needles. Mattress. No box springs so the bed was very low. I bought these to elevate and they did the job! One little problem is my frame legs are near the side so you stub your toe on these until you learn “stub me once, shame on you; stub me twice, shame on me.”
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Read complete description
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be sturdy, pleased with them. Was mislead by wording of 8 piece set though. It's a total of 8 pieces, different sizes, and I needed 6 risers, so I had to put wood under the middle two pieces of my bed. My fault for not reading complete description, but I assumed 8 piece set meant 8 risers.
customer_reviews.author: babydejour

customer_reviews.title: I took care of my mother-in-law that was in a ...
customer_reviews.text: I took care of my mother-in-law that was in a hospital bed. The bed didn't come up high enough so I ordered these and used the 3 inch riser and boy did it help.
customer_reviews.author: L. Braxdale

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Mult Height Bed Risers
customer_reviews.text: These HD Bed Risers work as advertised and take hold up to more than 300 lbs. Would recommend anyone needing space to buy these!
customer_reviews.author: djnorthwoods

customer_reviews.title: lifts the whole room!
customer_reviews.text: Came today. Easy to install, although I did take the mattress off. Really literally elevated the whole rooms ambience.
customer_reviews.author: D from SC

customer_reviews.title: To use it, I'd need to replace a part.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived with a broken foot. The edge was stnapped off of the fourth foot that I needed. Because of that, the legs are even.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than 2 months - Pretty much a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.text: Things are about worthless. We used the 5" ones, and when sitting on the edge of the bed yesterday, the bed frame busted through the top of the riser. Don't waste your money on this worthless piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: Lasted four months and then one busted and my bed went falling. They were very unstable in the first place. Always falling over. I had to be gently climbing in and out of bed. It was just me on a double bed and I'm about 145lbs. It wasn't the greatest.
customer_reviews.author: sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Bed Risers
customer_reviews.text: We like them because they were easy to install, has the bed up high so you can store underneath. It really works.
customer_reviews.author: Curtrenton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for raising our king size bed to add some storage space underneath. Extremely stable, I might add.
customer_reviews.author: Len Smith

customer_reviews.title: No pleased
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all 2 of these broke within 2 weeks of using them. I do not recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this product very well. Not easy to position.
customer_reviews.author: Gee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holding up a dorm bed for a pretty big guy right now, so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: AlwayzShoppin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are truly well made and are "Heavy Duty". So far I see no sign of cracking.
customer_reviews.author: TWC

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The middle broke out after a month! Terrible product. Fixed that one and then the second one broke.
customer_reviews.author: Urban-mom-of-three

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The feet of my slide-leaf pub table fit perfectly as the dimensions were exactly as stated. Durable.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They do the job. Had to order 2 sets because my frame had 9 legs to it
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S.

customer_reviews.title: Substantial and strong bed risers.  Will last at least 50 years!
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the fine quality of these Bed Risers so much, I bought 2 sets.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my couch not in my bed because we going to break

customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to elevate my art table where I watercolor.

customer_reviews.text: Works great. Just as expected. Shipping on time and packaging great.

customer_reviews.text: I used these in my dorm (just the 5 in) and they were perfect now I have so much storage space
customer_reviews.author: good stuff lover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been using them for 4 months without any issues as a 170 lb guy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cady

customer_reviews.title: 3 out of 4 ain't bad!
customer_reviews.text: They're working so far! Have a 9 post bed, so used 3 of the five inch portions for the 3 front posts and the 3 three inch portions for the middle posts. Seems very stable. Downside, I have one of the three sets unused.
customer_reviews.author: ROG

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Love the fact they are customizable. Feel very well built.
customer_reviews.author: dragonmasterdoo

customer_reviews.title: ... for making my desk into a standing desk- work like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Used them as a hack for making my desk into a standing desk- work like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Karlos

customer_reviews.title: I am using just the larger of the two and is great.
customer_reviews.text: When we put on the 2nd level of risers, several popped off before we could even get the weight of the ed on them. I am using just the larger of the two and is great.
customer_reviews.author: Louwanna Young

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as the reviews read. One of the risers cracked within the first 3 days. My bed broke through the 2nd one a couple days following. I can't imagine my bed being that heavy to crack the risers. The review states that they hold up to 12,000 lbs. I'm not seeing it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Kerley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal!
customer_reviews.text: I love this carpet cleaner. It works very well. After cleaning my carpet it looks brand new. It works wonderfully for pet stains!
customer_reviews.author: Sheree B.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We are returning them because we don't need them after all. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Doris L. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not for me!
customer_reviews.text: These turned over when the bed moved more than an inch.
customer_reviews.author: Discerning Consumer

product_meta.title: Structures 8 Piece Heavy Duty Multi Height Bed Risers Set, 3"/5" or 8"
product_meta.description: Maximize the storage space under your bed with structures' bed risers. These heavy duty risers have been newly reconstructed to be able to hold up to 1,200 pounds and create up to 29 cubic feet of storage space. Each bed riser's Recessed top can securely hold a bed frame foot up to 2.75 inches wide and won't scratch or dent hardwood floors. Use the 3-Inch risers, the 5-Inch risers, or stack them together for an 8-Inch riser. The set includes eight total pieces, creating variable heights of 3, 5 or 8 inches.
feature_bullets: Modular design - 8 total pieces for up to 8 inches of under-the-bed clearance
Heavy-duty construction; holds up to 1,200 pounds
Safe, strong, stackable and easy to use
Can be used as 3-inch, 5-inch, or 8-inch bed risers
Won't scratch or dent hardwood floors

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars233 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
